transcript:
Customer: Hello

Hello
Executive: Haan madam.
Customer: Good afternoon sir, ka baat kar rahi hu.
Executive: Haan haan boliye na.
Customer: Sir hamara jo account chal raha hai pack pack aapka sir jo leads vagera hai vo kafi dino se consume nahi ho raha hai kuch issue aa raha hai kya sir services mein?
Customer: Madam main do teen din se to phone laga raha hu aapko nahi utha rahe hain.
Executive: Nahi utha rahe aap kisko phone laga rahe the sir matlab aap aapke jo account manager hai unka sir naam hai Poonam Diwakar unka number
Customer: Nahi nahi aapko to laga rahe the meri bhi parso ke din bhi baat hui thi na parso narso aapse vo mera mera jo tha na vo usme koi MP Madhya Pradesh khul nahi raha na usme.
Executive: MP wala nahi khul raha hai aapka filter?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Okay. Sir main ek baar dekh leti hu ki aap kaise use karte ho phone se ya laptop se?
Customer: Phone se karta hu.
Executive: Sir phone pe jaise jab aap bylead wala part open karte ho na to vaha pe ek option aata hai sabse upar location ka to location mein ja kar ke aap jaise MP ka filter search kar sakte ho vaha pe search karne ka option aata hai jaha pe type country state city likha hota hai to vaha pe aap jayenge.
Customer: Haan aap aap aap meri screen attach kar lo aur dekh lo na. Dekh lo na main aapko bata du vaha ke ye ye problem aa rahi hai.
Executive: Thik hai.

Sir jaise maine abhi MP ka filter lagaya to mujhe ek lead dikhai de rahi hai dry fruit packaging pouch Indore se. Polypropylene zip zipper stand pouch matlab leads to aa rahi hai but ho sakta hai ki kisi issue ki vajah se ya fir vo app mein matlab aap use kar rahe ho to kahi na kahi vo hide ho raha ho to is vajah se nahi show kar raha ho aapko aap agar video meeting pe connect kar sakte hai to connect kar lijiye main aapko sari cheeze guide kar deti hu.
Customer: Abhi apne parso din bhi aap bhul bhi jate madam parso din apni baat hui to thi.
Executive: Sir actually main Anshika baat kar rahi hu aapne matlab India Mart ka number hai ye jaise aapne isme phone kiya na to vo mere pass aaya hai aapki jo baat hui thi parso vo kisi aur se hui thi sir.
Customer: Ab vo har bar to madam badal hi jate nahi keh sakta hu.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir vo actually main unke senior baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Ye ye ab aap attach kariye dekho ye kya problem aati hai.
Executive: Vo sir actually kya ho raha hai ki jab aap app app open karte hai na to vaha pe koi filter nahi laga hota hai uske baad mein jaise aapko jis bhi location ka use karna hai ya jis bhi location se aapko bylead chahiye.
Customer: Ye dekho ye dekho abhi dikh raha hai Madhya Pradesh ki.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Madhya Pradesh ki ek ye aa gayi ye dekho ye Madhya Pradesh ki ek ye aayi hai ek ye Indore ki.
Executive: Haan ji Indore ki bhi aayi hai aur uske niche aap dekhenge aur bhi leads honge sir.
Customer: Ab Madhya Pradesh mein dusri aur leads niche nahi dikh rahi hai.
Executive: Thoda scroll kariye.
Customer: Chalo isko consume kar li maine ye message bhi kar diya unko.
Executive: Thik hai sir. Aur isme kya kehte hai thoda sa niche aur scroll kariye aapko MP se aur lead dikhai dengi. Aap vaise kya matlab basic jyada aapka jo deal vagera hota hai ya business hota hai vo MP location se hota hai?
Customer: Haan ye MP se bahar kar bhi nahi sakte hum kyuki vo lakdi ka kamkaj hamara lakdi ki plate ke janne mein thodi problem hai MP se bahar jane mein kuch MP ke andar aane mein problem nahi hai MP se bahar jane mein bahut problem aati hai.
Executive: Okay okay sir.
Sir ek baar aap apna register number batayenge jis number se aapne services apne register karwai hai?
Customer: Yahi wala hai.
Executive: Sir actually abhi to aapka number jo hai na vo virtual number hamare mein show hota hai isliye.
Customer: 88877
Hanji 877
Zero
Zero
75
75
7360
Executive: 7360 okay.

Thik hai sir. Sir isme kya kehte hai main ek baar na aapke account manager se bhi discuss kar leti hu ki aapko sirf MP ke andar ki lead chahiye aapko whatsapp ke through bhi leads vagera aapko share kar diya kare aur alag se jaise aap jab bylead app consume karte hai na to aap aap MP ke sath sath jo bhi location ho gaye jaise Indore ho gaya Guna ho gaya ya fir Gwalior ho gaya aap un city ka bhi filter laga ke check karenge na to aapko ek do lead dikh jayengi fir aap vaha se apne hisab se.
Customer: Ye ye ye ye dekho abhi vapas gayab ho gayi aap meri screen attach karo aapko samajh mein aa jayega kya problem aa rahi hai.
Executive: Sir actually kya hota hai na dekhiye matlab jaise ki agar hum all over India deal karte hai to hamare pass kahi na kahi agar ek product ki lead 100 generate ho rahi hai to all over India mein deal karenge to 100 ka hamare pass option hoga but agar hum jaise hamara option ho gaya ki hame sirf MP ke andar se chahiye to kahi na kahi usme se 100 mein se 15 ya 20 hi hamare kam ke honge ab 15 20 kyuki MP se aayi hai ek din ke main baat kar rahi hu 15 20 lead ek din mein generate ho rahi hai MP se to MP mein hamare sath sath aur bhi bahut sare log deal karte hai to kya hoga ki vo jab agar aap active nahi rahoge aur aap check nahi karte rahoge to agar lead aayegi bhi to vo sold out ho jayegi matlab ki ek lead ko panch log consume kar sakte hai to jaise hum active nahi hai to koi aur person active hai unhone consume kar li to is tarike se jaise abhi aapne ek dekhi sir aap active the to abhi aapko lead dikh gayi consume ho gayi agar aap vahi busy hote aur koi aur log active hote to vo consume kar lete to is vajah se thoda sa issue rehta hai baki aapke notification vagera maine check kar liye hai ki aapke app pe agar koi bhi lead post hoti hai to turant aapke pass notification aa jaya kare vo on hai sara kuch sir aur jo baki leads vagera ke liye.
Customer: Aap aapne abhi jaise vo thi abhi jo dikh rahi thi na mere ko vo gayab ho gayi hai abhi.
Executive: Aapne consume kar li na usko?
Customer: To gayab ho jati hai?
Executive: Gayab nahi ho jati sir jaise man lijiye aapne consume kar li vo aur vo char logo ne aur consume kar li hogi to uski ek limit hoti hai ki ek lead ko sirf panch log hi consume kar sakte hai to vo sold out ho jati hai matlab ab vo aapke mein dikhayegi lekin sold out wale option mein dikhayegi ki ab vo lead matlab active nahi hai vo already panch logo ne connect kar liya hai usse.
Customer: Are aap samajh nahi rahe hai madam ye pehle bhi jaise kya aayega ki vo itni sari jaise ye sari dikhati na aisi line se. Jaise dikha do usko matlab mere ko jaise Madhya Pradesh mein ja rahi na main kuch bhi nahi aa raha dekho main kya kya likha hua aa raha hai vaha pe MP mein ja raha hu main to vaha likha hua aa raha hai go to search by leads.
Executive: Ek second rukiye sir ek second line par rahiye main check kar lu.



Sir jaise maine aap video meeting pe connect kar sakte hai kya panch minute ka agar time ho aapke pass to?
Customer: Haan kar lenge na.
Executive: Okay main aapko ek baar na video meeting ka link share kar rahi hu ek minute.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's MP filter is not working.

- Customer is unable to see leads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to use filters.

- Executive offered a video meeting for assistance.

- Executive will discuss the issue with account manager.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to share video meeting link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, filter, mp, video meeting
